name: Streetbees
slogan: Real people. Real lives. In real time
description:
Streetbees is a London-based global intelligence platform that reveals how people behave, and why, by analysing real-life moments collected from its worldwide users on an always-on basis.
 
Over 2 million users – or ‘bees’ – across 150 countries worldwide use the chat-style Streetbees app to share moments from their daily lives via videos, photos and text, giving as much or as little information as they like. Through applying advanced natural language processing technology to the results, Streetbees uncovers not just what they do, but also why they do it, and what drives them – and predicts what they may do next.
 
This allows Streetbees’ customers – who include Unilever, PepsiCo, BBC World Service, Vodafone and L’Oreal – to receive rich insights into communities anywhere in the world at an unprecedented scale and affordable cost, helping them deeply understand new or unfamiliar markets.

jobs.title: Client Partner
jobs.description:
Streetbees is building the world’s first marketplace for business intelligence, connecting brands and agencies with real people on the ground via our innovative and chat-style app to gather real-time and in-the-moment insights.

We’re currently looking for hugely ambitious people to join our rapidly growing business as a Client Partner, seeking out and developing account relationships with world leading brands across industries such as FMCG/CPG, Telecoms, Media, Retail, and Home/Utilities.

Streetbees Client Partners combine industry knowledge, senior relationship-building skills and a solutions-based, consultative-selling approach to deliver client-based growth via revolutionary consumer data and insights.

Key responsibilities:

* Develop a deep understanding of a client’s business, brand, industry, and consumers/customers – as well as the role of consumer insight in bringing their commercial ambitions to life
* Identify, evaluate and manage all aspects of our sales process from identifying prospects through to closing the sales
* Create consultative (pitch) presentations using industry knowledge, market trends, and the unique solutions provided through the Streetbees community and technology platform
* Present needs-based solutions and high-quality responses to RFPs – from contextual understanding through to research approach and pricing
* Take responsibility for positively building client relationships over time as their go-to trusted advisor in the consumer insight space
* Develop short-term and long-term strategies for large client accounts, and deliver on those strategies to build a strong and sustainable project pipeline
* Manage ultimate profit and loss responsibility for your portfolio of client relationships
* Be a major contributor to Streetbees’ new business targets, accurately and effectively managing leads in order to prioritise business opportunities and internal resources
* Collaborate with our tight-knit team of strategists, community manager, technology engineers and product managers to improve and develop ways of working that better serve our clients and ladder up to Streetbees USPs
* Contribute to the retention and motivation of a high-quality Client Growth team


Requirements

Skills and Experience:

Senior-level experience in either a Client Service or Strategy role (Consumer Insight, Advertising, Branding/Marketing, Consulting or Market Research background) in which you were directly responsible for new business, revenue growth and building client relationships to create a strong internal pipeline.

You do NOT need to have direct hands-on experience in delivering and/or managing consumer research (e.g. survey design, data analysis, etc.) – BUT you should have considerable exposure to and feel familiar with the outputs of qualitative and quantitative consumer research and understand how they can be used to fuel a range of client projects/KPIs.

The type of person we’re looking for:

* Problem solver – You are a natural problem solver and trusted advisor to clients, never shy of presenting a point of view to deliver on client objectives
* Passion for consumer insight – You have an interest in new technologies and in the power of consumer data and insights as foundations for business growth
* Cognitive intelligence – You can think on your feet, seeing all the angles to best position our platform to best fit a client’s project needs
* Client empathy – You’ll be building deep, trusting relationships to create Streetbees champions within the client businesses you manage
* Hunger for success – You’ll be ambitious and proud of your achievements to date
* Positivity – You’ve got the charisma, but not the ego, to make a good impression
* A pro-active nature - You’re a self-starter who doesn’t need much guidance, who can think fast on their feet and are ready to pivot when required
* Start-up attitude – You’re comfortable in a rapidly changing environment, working with limited resources, and delivering high-quality work at the speed which is necessary for successful business growth
* Curiosity - You’re interested in learning more about the industry and show an outstanding curiosity towards the client base

Benefits

This is a great opportunity to work closely with a lively, diverse and high calibre team in a fast paced and high growth commercial environment. As a Client Partner, you will get a competitive salary, and work in a highly social team in a modern, fun and open planned office.

At Streetbees, your company benefits will include:

1) A 24-day paid holiday allowance as well as one paid volunteering day per quarter.

2) Flexible working hours - we trust people to manage their time and to focus on wider results; so if you need to work from home to finish a project or leave at 5 on a Tuesday for Choir practice, ensure your manager knows in advance, but feel free to take it.

3) An external training or conference budget of £500 and reimbursement for any travel undertaken that is related to your line of work during your working hours

4) A pension scheme - our new pension scheme means that Streetbees will start paying a percentage of your salary towards your pension. For further details on how this works get in touch with our head of HR for further information.

5) Activities that foster a positive work community including: Friday catchups, a video games room featuring a Nintendo Switch, monthly company socials, and so much more.


We launched in 2015 and in less than a year expanded to 87 countries. We work with clients ranging from Unilever, Pepsi and Uber, generating valuable proprietary data and insights. Streetbees is backed by world-class investors such as LocalGlobe, Octopus and BGF Ventures.

Learn more and watch our introduction to conversational research: http://bit.ly/2aXs2Zb (http://workable.com/nr?l=http%3A%2F%2Fbit.ly%2F2aXs2Zb)

Try out the Streetbees app: Android (http://bit.ly/2dOyzKn)

IOS (http://apple.co/2ebSMWr)

For more information, come and have a look around at www.streetbees.com (http://workable.com/nr?l=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.streetbees.com)

jobs.title: Research Director
jobs.description:
Here at Streetbees we're building the world’s first marketplace for business intelligence, connecting brands and agencies with real people on the ground to gather real-time and in the moment insights. We want to collect the world's data into a platform that will allow companies to truly understand the worlds thoughts and habits as they change.

We’re now seeking out a Research Director; someone who can bring exceptional research & insight skills, combined with a very hands-on approach to build and own a lot of the research.

Responsibilities:

* Designing research across a wide range client projects as well as putting together proprietary insight reports.

* Lead on insight delivery. You’ll be the point-person for insights for a large section of our clientbase and likely own sectors as we grow.
* Client management & development. You’ll be engaging with the clients and take pride in our successes.
* Presenting solutions and findings to key clients & internal stakeholders.
* Supporting business development team with new and existing business. Our team is growing fast so we’re keen to find someone comfortable working across their clients and supporting new growth.
* Championing data quality, validity & reliability.

Requirements

* Skills and Experience
* 8+ years experienc
* Strong Qualitative background at a brand, market research agency or within a market research function within a media / publishing agency
* Excellent client management skills
* Interpreting high volume raw qual data and pulling out key insights
* Storytelling and producing creative deliverables
* Outstanding written communication skills
* Self-motivated with excellent time management
* Passionate about helping us reinvent the world of market intelligence and excited to lend their hand to anything
* Fluent in English; Second language a plus
* University degree with a 2.1 or higher

The type of person we’re looking for:

* Problem solver – You are a natural problem solver and trusted advisor to clients, never shy of presenting a point of view to deliver on client objectives
* Passion for consumer insight – You have an interest in new technologies and in the power of consumer data and insights as foundations for business growth
* Cognitive intelligence – You can think on your feet, seeing all the angles to best position our platform to best fit a client’s project needs
* Client empathy – You’ll be building deep, trusting relationships to create Streetbees champions within the client businesses you manage
* Hunger for success – You’ll be ambitious and proud of your achievements to date
* Positivity – You’ve got the charisma, but not the ego, to make a good impression
* A pro-active nature - You’re a self-starter who doesn’t need much guidance, who can think fast on their feet and are ready to pivot when required
* Start-up attitude – You’re comfortable in a rapidly changing environment, working with limited resources, and delivering high-quality work at the speed which is necessary for successful business growth
* Curiosity - You’re interested in learning more about the industry and show an outstanding curiosity towards the client base


Benefits

This is a great opportunity to work closely with a lively, diverse and high calibre team in a fast paced and high growth commercial environment. As Research Director, you will get a competitive salary, and work in a highly social team in a modern, fun and open planned office.

At Streetbees, your company benefits will include:

1) A 24-day paid holiday allowance as well as one paid volunteering day per quarter.

2) Flexible working hours - we trust people to manage their time and to focus on wider results; so if you need to work from home to finish a project or leave at 5 on a Tuesday for Choir practice, ensure your manager knows in advance, but feel free to take it.

3) An external training or conference budget of £500 and reimbursement for any travel undertaken that is related to your line of work during your working hours

4) A pension scheme - our new pension scheme means that Streetbees will start paying a percentage of your salary towards your pension. For further details on how this works get in touch with our head of HR for further information.

5) Activities that foster a positive work community including: Friday catchups, a video games room featuring a Nintendo Switch, monthly company socials, and so much more.


We launched in 2015 and in less than a year expanded to 87 countries. We work with clients ranging from Unilever, Pepsi and Uber, generating valuable proprietary data and insights. Streetbees is backed by world-class investors such as LocalGlobe, Octopus and BGF Ventures.

Learn more and watch our introduction to conversational research: http://bit.ly/2aXs2Zb (http://workable.com/nr?l=http%3A%2F%2Fworkable.com%2Fnr%3Fl%3Dhttp%253A%252F%252Fbit.ly%252F2aXs2Zb)

Try out the Streetbees app: Android (http://bit.ly/2dOyzKn)

IOS (http://apple.co/2ebSMWr)

For more information, come and have a look around at www.streetbees.com (http://workable.com/nr?l=http%3A%2F%2Fworkable.com%2Fnr%3Fl%3Dhttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.streetbees.com)
